freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate:
reference H77_AF009606 feature-location precursor_polyprotein <#list rows as row> <#assign h77Start>${row["H77_START"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign h77End>${row["H77_END"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign pubmedID>${row[" Pubmed ID"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign epitopeID>${row[" Epitope ID"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign epitope>${row["Epitope"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign date>${row[" Date"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign method>${row[" Method/Technique"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign protein>${row["PROTEIN"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign stage>${row["Stage"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign genotype>${row["Genotype"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign measurement>${row[" Measurement of"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign effectorCellTissueType>${row[" Effector Cell Tissue Type"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign effectorCellType>${row[" Effector Cell Type"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign effectorCellCultureConditions>${row[" Effector Cell Culture Conditions"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign fullHla>${row["Full HLA"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign partialHla>${row["Partial HLA"]?trim}</#assign>
<#if h77Start != "" && h77End != ""> <#assign variationName>IEDB_epitope_${epitopeID}</#assign> create variation --noCommit "${variationName}" -t AMINO_ACID "Linear epitope" variation "${variationName}" set pattern --noCommit ${epitope} set location --noCommit --labeledCodon ${h77Start} ${h77End} set field --noCommit displayName "IEDB epitope ${epitopeID}" set field --noCommit pubmed_id ${pubmedID} set field --noCommit publication_date_year ${date} set field --noCommit is_epitope true set field --noCommit epitope_iedb_id ${epitopeID} set field --noCommit epitope_method "${method}" set field --noCommit epitope_protein ${protein} <#if stage != ""> set field --noCommit epitope_stage "${stage}" </#if> <#if genotype?matches("^[1-9][a-z]{0,2}$") > set field --noCommit epitope_genotype ${genotype[0]} <#if genotype?length gt 1 > set field --noCommit epitope_subtype ${genotype[1..]} </#if> </#if> <#if measurement != ""> set field --noCommit epitope_measurement "${measurement}" </#if> <#if effectorCellTissueType != ""> set field --noCommit epitope_effector_tissue_type ${effectorCellTissueType} </#if> <#if effectorCellType != ""> set field --noCommit epitope_effector_cell_type "${effectorCellType}" </#if> <#if effectorCellCultureConditions != ""> set field --noCommit epitope_effector_cell_culture_condition "${effectorCellCultureConditions}" </#if> <#if fullHla != ""> set field --noCommit epitope_full_hla "${fullHla}" </#if> <#if partialHla != ""> set field --noCommit epitope_partial_hla "${partialHla}" </#if> exit </#if> </#list> exit exit commit
